values: Introducing the church in Brazil | Jonatas Cunha

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Jonatas Cunha, a Minister in the Presbyterian Church of Brazil. They discuss Brazil’s religious history; the Protestant landscape in Brazil; the problem of weak theological resources; the universality of distinctive vocational challenges; the dangers of pastoral introspection; Jonatas’s upbringing and ministry; church planting; theological visions for church ministry; the CREC […]
